p3admin.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Protected Point to Point adminstrator interface file

Copyright (C) Velocite 2010

The adminstrator interface is used to manage the key server as well as secondary P3 systems.

#include "p3admin.h"
#include "p3pri_ui.h"
#include "p3sec_ui.h"
